name: Boundary (itch)
description:
While exploring an abandoned shrine, Renko finds herself transported to Gensokyo.  But something is wrong - she's trapped underground, and everyone is dead.  

Not for long, however; each time Renko dies, the boundary of life and death shifts to resurrect her.  And the deader Renko is, the more things that are brought back to life - both friends and foes.    

Controls: 

Move - WASD

Interact - Hover + Left click

Aim - Right click (if have weapon)

Shoot - Left click while aiming

Select weapon - 1 for hakkero, 2 for ice (once acquired)

Team: 

Lead - https://twitter.com/Rakaasac

Programming - https://twitter.com/Taizen_Chisou

Character art - https://twitter.com/vibrantrida

Music - https://twitter.com/alc_latte

Sound effects - https://twitter.com/_Gubbles
